DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , double blind , randomize , sham control , parallel group , multi-center study include enrollment 660 Subjects . Subjects follow 90 day post stroke onset . The primary effectiveness endpoint study binary endpoint defines success modify Rankin Scale ( mRS ) score 0-2 failure mRS score 3-6 90 day last rating . The secondary effectiveness endpoint study change NIHSS score baseline 90 day last rating , analyze across full range score NIHSS .
